#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
using namespace std;
const int maxn=1e5+5,inf=1e9+7;

double use[105]={0,1.000000000000,1.000000000000,2.666666666667,
4.500000000000,
6.400000000000,
8.333333333333,
10.285714285714,
12.250000000000,
14.222222222222,

48.076923076923,
50.074074074074,

54.068965517241,
56.066666666667,
58.064516129032,
60.062500000000,
62.060606060606,

70.054054054054,

86.044444444444,
88.043478260870,
90.042553191489,
92.041666666667,
94.040816326531,
96.040000000000

};

int main(void){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    ///for(int i=0;i<100;++i) cout<<use[i]<<' ';
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        cout<<fixed<<setprecision(12)<<use[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
